data.title: I thought the pile of bread is a good idea, and the proprietors were very friendly, if somewhat pre-occupied,  but it...
data.text: I thought the pile of bread is a good idea, and the proprietors were very friendly, if somewhat pre-occupied,  but it was a slow time of day.  I had never had pickled turnips before, so those were interesting, but I thought the beef shwarma was a little on the fatty side. I would go again though, absolutely.
